name: Ferret
description: Automate the syndication of RSS feed posts to various social media platforms seamlessly with Ferret. Simplify your content distribution process and reach your audience effortlessly.

name: Leben in Deutschland App
description: Mobile app & web portal to master Germany’s naturalization test with real‑world practice questions and progress tracking.

name: Azure Draw‑IO Assets
description: A curated collection of Microsoft Azure icons and shapes for Draw.io—keep your architecture diagrams fresh with the latest official assets.

name: Resume Builder
description: ATS‑optimized resume generator built in TypeScript & React—craft shareable, recruiter‑friendly CVs with a click.

name: Links Organizer
description: Easy social‑link manager in TypeScript—collect and share all your online profiles from a single dashboard.

name: AI Playground
description: Interactive AI experimentation space: spin up ONNX models, RAG flows with LangChain.js, and mobile‑friendly inference demos.

name: Secure Azure Infra (Terraform)
description: Production‑ready Terraform modules and best practices for locking down Azure environments with zero‑trust principles.
